description: This plugin adds custom scrollbars to your app's pages. Colours, widths and more can be adjusted in the plugins tab.
name: Custom Scrollbar
plugin_instructions:
You can adjust settings in the plugins tab.

Unfortunately, I can't set any defaults, so you will need to fill out all the inputs before seeing any results.

Colours are anything that will be correct when interpreted as a CSS colour (e.g. black, #4FF, #FFFFF8, etc.)

The width of the scrollbar is just a simple number.
